ARABIC: كَذَٰلِكَ يُؤْفَكُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجْحَدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is how those who deny Allah's Signs have been perverted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Only they are turned away thus who deny the signs of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus it is only those who had denied Allah's Signs that were led astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus are indeed those who have rejected the revelations of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is how those who deny the signs of Allah go reverting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus were turned away those who used to deny the Ayat of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Thus were turned away those who denied the communications of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Even so perverted are they who deny the signs of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus are they perverted who deny the revelations of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Thus, indeed, those who deny the signs of God turn away from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In this wise have those strayed who the signs of Allah were away want to gainsay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Those who were used to impugning the signs of Allah are thus made to go astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus are deluded those who are wont to reject the Signs of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus were turned away those who used to deny the Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such those who disbelieve the signs of Allah turn away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Thus are turned away those who dispute the signs of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Thus were those [before you] deluded who were rejecting the signs of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:63] So deviate, that is, in the same way that these [Meccans] deviate, deviate, those who used to deny the signs of God, His miracles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus are they perverted) lie against Allah (who deny the revelations of Allah) who disbelieve in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an.
